name: Koshish Charitable Trust

address: Abdin house, Fraser Road, Patna 800001 Bihar, INDIA

briefDescription: The focus of the entire work of Koshish is on the nexus between lack of access to legal rights and economic, social and political deprivation. Bihar is a state where the Starvation situation was visible in the last five years and even now, socio-economic backward communities live with hunger.We have been working on food security, grass root justice delivery system, child rights, women empowerment, homeless, elderly, slum dwellers. Etc.Our direct beneficiaries are 17535
